arts.ttl: Four things we learned from Manchester United 2-1 Chelsea
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes and Casemiro both found the net in the first half after the Blues were reduced to ten men; Robert Sanchez was given his marching orders after a risky challenge on Benjamin Sesko. Chelsea were poor in attack and managed only a single shot on target as they were pinned back by a determined United team, who pick up a second successive home victory.

arts.ttl: Man Utd get crucial win over Chelsea after early Sanchez red card
arts.sum: Manchester United hung on for a crucial win against Chelsea in the Premier League, in a frantic match that saw two red cards and three goals, all in torrential rain at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Amorim urges United to build on win over Chelsea
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim admitted Manchester United "complicated" their victory over Chelsea, but urged his players to build on the 2-1 win after easing the pressure at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Robert Sanchez breaks silence with apology after Chelsea red card vs Man United
arts.sum: Robert Sanchez issued an apology after he was shown a red card in Chelsea's 2-1 defeat to Manchester United in the Premier League at Old Trafford on Saturday evening

arts.ttl: Four Things We Learnt from Man United’s 2-1 win over Chelsea
arts.sum: Rúben Amorim’s Manchester United picked up three crucial points against Chelsea at Old Trafford. A long ball over the top led to Šeško’s flick-on, which set Mbeumo through before Sánchez’s reckless challenge reduced Chelsea to 10 men.

arts.ttl: Chelsea transfer decision came back to haunt Enzo Maresca against Man United, writes KIERAN GILL as Blues provided a masterclass in implosion at Old Trafford
arts.sum: Chelsea slumped to a disappointing 2-1 loss against a struggling Manchester United in the thrashing rain at Old Trafford on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Maresca explains Cole Palmer sub in Man Utd defeat
arts.sum: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca revealed that he subbed off Cole Palmer in the first half of their 2-1 defeat to Man Utd because he was not fully fit coming into the game. The Italian was forced into making changes shortly after kick off when Robert Sanchez was sent off for fouling Bryan Mbeumo as the […] The post Chelsea boss Maresca explains Cole Palmer sub in Man Utd defeat first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim urges Man Utd to stop making life ‘complicated’ after Chelsea win
arts.sum: United held on for a 2-1 victory after Trevoh Chalobah pulled one back for the visitors.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim issues demand to Man United squad after much-needed win over Chelsea - as under-fire boss admits club legends' brutal assessments of his side were 'mostly RIGHT'
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT AT OLD TRAFFORD: Goals from Bruno Fernandes and Casemiro ensured victory, despite a late fightback from Chelsea, on a day where both sides finished with 10 men.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim handed Man United lifeline thanks to 20 minutes of Chelsea chaos
arts.sum: Manchester United 2-1 Chelsea: An early red card for Robert Sanchez came to define a bizarre afternoon as the hosts earned a narrow win
